title: High Ping
body:
Latley I've been playing with 330-1000 ping and I don't know why. 
When I check my connection it's great and my ping at http://www.pingtest.net/   15.
Please help me so I can play normally.

replies.body: Is this high ping constant or is it suddenly spiking up?  Cases like these do result from network issues or how your ISP is routing to reach the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis of your specific case.  Let me know the results!
